name: Furry
detailed_description:
The year is 2250. Humanity has evolved into half human half wolf population. Your commander "Zucci" leads your way through the Andromeda Galaxy. Use your powerful ship equipped with specialty laser-rounds and space-rockets. Destroy everyone on your way in order to complete your mission.

Furry's features:


  • Space-ship
  • Two types of weapons equipped on your space-ship
  • Variety of AI space-ships (aggressive + different difficulty)

Roadmap:


  • Expanded levels
  • Variety of backgrounds
  • Achievements

PS: Your commander "Zucci" can be visible on your bottom right corner. Currently isn't interactive, but will be in the future.

short_description: The year is 2250. Humanity has evolved into half human half wolf population. Your commander "Zucci" leads your way through the Andromeda Galaxy. Use your powerful ship equipped with specialty laser-rounds and space-rockets. Destroy everyone on your way in order to complete your mission.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: i5-4670
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5-6600k
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
